name: Charles Curtis
text: wonderful staff and great pizzas. by your pizza's here you won't be sad you will be real happy

name: LukkyHunter
text: Watched them lose a girls order then take an hour to realize it was sitting there getting cold the entire time, haphazardly try to remake it, all while other customers were waiting to even be spoken to. Next time you should address the …More

name: Mortal Blow
text: Although, I'm not fond of pizza huts pizza(my children love it) I'm assuming it was good bc they ate every bite, they were fast and nice!

name: Elia Arangure
text: It took an hour and a half to get my pizza done. The staff was not wearing gloves nor mask. They were making the food again with no mask while touching their personal cellphones, cash register and face. Told them I didn’t want the pizza disgusted.

name: A Walker
text: DO NOT GO HERE! Read the reviews it’s been over a year and nothing has changed. Employees don’t care. General manager not wearing a mask during COVID pandemic. Don’t bother ORDERING AHEAD, pizza won’t be made until you get there with lame …More

name: Jason Walker
text: Do not go here. Do not order from here. Hardly anyone is wearing masks during the pandemic. The ones that were wearing them were wearing them incorrectly. My wife and I ordered a pizza on the app. Said that it would be ready in 40 minutes. …More

name: Courtney Vargas
text: Was a dine in order. I watched them mess us at least 3 orders while I waited. Then I finally get my food after a 35 minute wait for a dine in pizza, it was made wrong. Had to wait another 15 minutes for the pizza I ordered. The employees, I …More

name: Michael Smith
text: Walked in, asked about personal,  then added topping.  The young man behind the counter suggested getting a large with every thing. Price was about 50 cents more, than my personal with all the toppings plus a extra slices for later. Guilty...I love pizza.

name: Vincent Syler
text: Takes over 30 minutes AFTER it says it is on its way to arrive when I live less than 10 minutes away. Oh, and they leave off items and admittedly didn't pay attention to what should have been brought.

name: Amanda Appling
text: The delivery service is a joke. Will take well over an hour to receive your cold, beat up food. They only have one driver on any given night. Would not recommend.

name: Elizabeth Scott
text: I really do like this Pizza hut but tonight the service was bad had to wait a long time for my pizza even though the app said that it was done.I think there was only one person in their work in because the rest of them were standing out back on a smoke break it looked like.

name: Bill Turley
text: Normal Pizza Hut very good

name: amber blackford
text: Worst experience . Except for Paul who made sure to finally find our pizza and get us out the door!!

name: Jesse James
text: I put an order in online for pickup the night before my son's Birthday party. When I arrived at the store the next day, they had never received the order. But......they tood care of me and had 12 pizzas ready within 20 minutes. Talk about coming through in the clutch!!! Thanks Pizza Hut White House!!!

name: Craig
text: Open sign was lit and hours posted said they closed at 11:00pm.  We get there at 10:15pm and they said they’re already closed.  Sounds like the regional manager needs to check on the staff as they may be closing early.  If not, turn off the open sign and change the hours posted.

name: Brenda Smallwood
text: They can bake a delicious pizza !

name: Larry Upchurch
text: This has to be my worst experience with a pizza delivery in my life. Ordered a dinner box online 60/70 min wait for delivery. Ok no worries, over 90 mins later pizza showed up and cold I don't mean a little cold I mean sitting around for 30 …More

name: Weylon Elliott
text: They made me a pretty decent pizza.

name: Anthony Sardell
text: I wanted to order pizza at 11pm they closed at 12 according to website. They were already closed. Crazy. Lost out on business.

name: Josh Varellie
text: The only words I can use to describe the Pizza Hut of White House are utterly disrespectful and sad. I ordered 3 pizzas around 6:45 one night, and was still waiting for them by 8:15. The pizza was carelessly slung into the box with a care …More

name: Trevor Adamson
text: Pizza hut apparently had a "rezoning" and no longer service my house. I was asked if I wanted to submit a petition to district management. Why on earth would someone petition you to keep your own business lol?

name: Yonnie Mccullough
text: I came in and ordered a large pizza with Ham,Jalepenos,onions,and black olives.Waited 45 minutes on my pizza.Took it all the way home and noticed it wasnt all the way done in the middle.I called back up there and they simply refused to make …More

name: Monkey Ball
text: Very good pizza! Oh! And their chicken alfredo is the best in town!! Boneless wings are amazing too! Very satisfying visit thank you Pizza Hut!

name: Jason Ponce
text: Waited 50 min for a carry out order. Ordered TWO pizzas total and they forgot to make ONE of them. Didn't realize it until after the other pizza was done

name: peggy eller
text: Thought the new place would make a difference. WRONG NO SAUCE NO CHEESE. WORSE THAN BEFORE. Need help at this Pizza Hut they do not know how to make pizza. Every pizza at the hut in Springfield tn is great. What the heck. Will never go again. DONT GO AT THE HUT IN WHITEHOUSE TN.

name: angi co
text: Love Pizza Hut! The website is very slow on my phone, though.

name: Rick Jones
text: Service wasn't great (only one waitress).  Assumed we wanted buffet and once she brought drinks,  never saw her again.  Finally had to flag for down to place our order.  Had to ask for salad bar to be refilled, almost all containers were empty.

name: Ashley Casteel
text: friendly employees who are very knowledgeable and attentive

name: Carol Figueredo
text: Horrible pizza! No sauce, holes in stuffed crust pizza crust so bad, I couldn’t pick a slice up. The order was also wrong, had to reorder. It came back corrected, but this has happened before. I’m done with this place!

name: Patty Clements
text: Didn't receive all food I ordered and paid for... Hayley would not refund my money on items I didn't receive, she said she could give me a credit. That's just stupid. Pizza was burnt and after 2 deliveries I still didn't get all my food. Ugh

name: Kim Watson
text: Pizza was HORRIBLE!!! A cardboard box would have more flavor. Of course lack of flavor could be blamed to lack of sauce, cheese, and toppings. …More

name: Michel Clement
text: Succulent Véry good charming peoples

name: Wesley Lay
text:
DO NOT ORDER PIZZA HERE EVER!!!
The worst pizza hut ever. The service is terrible and they delivered my pizza to the wrong apartment then when I called they wouldn't compensate me. DO NOT EAT HERE!

name: Amy Elmore
text: Love there pizza there's great

name: mary rushing
text: Very miss leading, in specials and prices. Would give them a 0.

name: daniele powers
text: Pizza really greasy and after 30 mins I had waited I came in to pick up and had to wait another 30 min

name: Ashley Dever
text: Their delivery service is really slow. Sometimes it takes an hour to get my order of two things, a pizza and p’zone.

name: Cheryl Hunter
text: Good pizza!

name: Don Dixon
text: Good food.

name: lillian Richmond
text: Did not meet advertisement

name: Crazy _Phucker
text: Pizza is good, wings are swell.
